title: (Lesbian! Comedy!) Love on the Side (DivX)
description:
Not exactly aimed at a lesbian audience, this excellent Canadian comedy on love is a gem, nevertheless.

Waitress Eve (Marla Sokoloff) happens to have a big life-time crush on a local small town boy. Eve is so pretty, but for some reason (considered a bit overweight and taken for granted as yet another extra belonging to the neighbourhood) no one gives her second glance, until an out-of-town bombshell of a girl (Monika Schnarre) drops by and starts courting her while the boys drop their jaws.

Never having seen the light of lesbian wonders, Eve for the first time however does feel appreciated for who she is by this wonderful woman and things take on different turns for all of them.

Jennifer Tilly (that irresistible mafia girlfriend from Bound, you know) is very funny as a friend of Eve?s.

English stereo
Two-pass extra slow conversion from dvd to DivX
Rar-ed for faster upload.
